text: Spawn is an 1997 superhero movie that was based on the 1990s superhero character of the same name created by Todd McFarlane. == Cast == *Michael Jai White as Al Simmons / Spawn *John Leguizamo as Violator *Martin Sheen as Jason Wynn *Frank Welker as the voice of Malebolgia ==Other websites== * Category:1997 action movies Category:1990s superhero movies Category:African- American superhero movies Category:American action movies Category:English- language movies Category:New Line Cinema movies Category:Spawn (comics) Category:Movies set in North Korea Category:American superhero movies
title: Spawn (movie)
